settings.title: Our brands
settings.subtitle: BHFO carries fashions from top designers around the world.

settings.title: Big Sale Alert: 50% Off Select Styles!
settings.subtitle: Explore our
settings.text:
Discover incredible savings with our exclusive offer: Enjoy a whopping 50% off on selected styles! Whether you're shopping for a special occasion or simply treating yourself, now is the perfect time to indulge in our latest collection.

Hurry, these deals won't last long!

settings.title: BHFO is one of the largest and most trusted outlets of designer clothing, shoes, and accessories online.
settings.text: We work directly with some of the largest brands and retailers in the world to bring you the name brands that are famous for their quality and style.

settings.title: Our business started on Ebay where we reached the achievement of almost three-million positive feedback.
Like many small businesses, we started in our basement in Cedar Rapids, Iowa in 2003.
settings.text:
Both of us having a business and retail background, we had a vision of building our own successful brand where we could use our entrepreneurial skills we had always dreamed of.  

Our passion is to serve and help others, so starting this business enabled us to offer great opportunities for people in our community along with offering our customers a place to shop with great value and customer service.  If you are wondering where BHFO got its name, the B and H are our daughter’s initials and F and O stand for Factory Outlet.

settings.title: Our business grew rapidly
settings.text:
We continued to partner with new brands and expand across other global marketplaces,   and our business grew rapidly.

Now, after three moves to accommodate our growth, we call a 240,000 sq. ft. facility in Cedar Rapids home.  With the inclusion of the Perfect Pick™ order fulfillment technology, BHFO is able to provide faster and more accurate service from its newest location.

settings.title: If you purchase from BHFO, here is what you can expect:
settings.text:
- We guarantee all items are authentic or your money back.
- We offer a Best Price Guarantee - domestic competitors only.
- We strive for 5-Star Customer Service. We want you to enjoy your experience and come back to shop often.  Be sure to reach out via telephone or email. We love to talk to our customers!
- Due to our great partnerships with brands and large buying power, we are able to offer thousands of new products daily.

We appreciate the opportunity to serve you!

Sincerely,
Jon and Stacie Sefton
- Founders

settings.title: Send us a message
settings.subtitle: We would love to hear your questions, suggestions or if you just want to chat!

settings.subtext: We buy low and pass the savings to you!
Thousands of new, fresh products offered daily
Designer brands without breaking your budget
Order leaves our warehouse within 1 business day

settings.title: Who Is BHFO?
settings.text:
BHFO is off-price retailer delivering great value to our customers by combining the Best Brands in Fashion at Better Prices.

Value is a blend of amazing brands, on trend fashion, price, and 5-star customer service.

We do very little promotional activity like sales or coupons – just the Best Brands at unbelievable prices, all the time.

settings.title: We Have a Team of Shoppers, working for you!
settings.text:
Our Buyers are always scouring the world for the hottest deals for your entire family. We buy from all kinds of vendors: Famous Retailers, Boutiques, Big Name Brands, Designer Labels, and up and coming brands. This means that some of our inventory was on a sales floor and could have been tried on, just like what you find when you shop at a retail store.

All items are in NEW condition with tags unless otherwise noted. Some items may need to be pressed or steamed. Our opportunistic purchasing style allows us to bring you the Best Brands at Better Prices, all the time.

settings.title: Thousands of New Items Daily
settings.text:
Unlike traditional retailers, that receive new products seasonally, we add thousands of new products daily! Our rapidly changing inventory produces a one-of-a-kind experience that you won’t find anywhere else online. Make sure to shop us often to get the freshest deals at amazing prices!

If you see something you love, snag it quick! We don’t often have extra stock behind items, or even full-size runs. If you check back tomorrow, it will most likely be gone.

settings.title: How Can We Offer the Best Price
settings.subtitle: Just the Best Brands in fashion at Better Prices, day in and day out.
settings.text: Our no-frills packaging and shipping practices allow us to keep our cost low and pass on the savings to you. Most items are shipped in a poly- mailer, rather than wrapped in a box with tissue paper and pretty ribbons. Items that may incur in transit damage will be shipped in a box. We charge shipping on our site, which allows us to keep our prices low. No baked in costs to offer “free shipping” passed on to the customer.

settings.text_1:
It's easy and free!

The “BHFO Rewards Club” is our way of offering
more value to YOU for being a loyal customer!
settings.text_2:
As one of the largest and most trusted outlets of designer clothing, shoes and accessories,
we SO appreciate you! This is our way of thanking you for your constant love and support.
settings.text_3:
For every $ you spend on www.bhfo.com, you will earn points that you can redeem
for additional savings when you order! You can also earn points by following us on social media,

referring friends, writing reviews, and more!

settings.title: Refer a Friend Who Makes a Purchase
Leave a Review with a Photo/Video

settings.question: WHAT IF I ALREADY HAVE A BHFO CLUB ACCOUNT?
settings.answer: Wonderful! You have been automatically enrolled in the BHFO rewards points program. We made the program to be effective retroactively starting February 1, 2021. Any purchases made since then will be reflected in your account.

settings.question: WHO’S ELIGIBLE FOR THE BHFO CLUB?
settings.answer: Anyone and everyone! Just sign up for an account and start earning points. Keep in mind, only one account per customer, please. If you have more than one account, you will lose all acquired points across each account that you have.

settings.question: HOW DO I REDEEM MY POINTS?
settings.answer: After logging into your BHFO account, click the BHFO Rewards Club button on the lower left-hand side of any BHFO page. This will take you to your BHFO Rewards Club homepage. There you can redeem your points!

settings.question: DO MY POINTS EVER EXPIRE?
settings.answer: Your points will expire if they aren't used after 365 days (One year).

settings.question: HOW DO I CHECK HOW MANY POINTS I HAVE?
settings.answer: After logging into your BHFO rewards account, click the Rewards button on the lower left-hand side of any BHFO page and select the Home tab to see how many points you have earned.

settings.question: I’M NOT SEEING MY POINTS IN MY ACCOUNT
settings.answer: Sometimes it can take our system a few minutes to process and apply points to your account. If you don’t see the points within 48 hours, please send us a chat message OR email us at support@bhfo.com

settings.question: WHY DID MY POINTS BALANCE GO DOWN?
settings.answer: If you or one of your referrals recently canceled a purchase or made a return, this can affect your points balance.

settings.question: HOW DO I LEAVE THE BHFO CLUB POINTS PROGRAM?
settings.answer: Email us at support@bhfo.com. Please keep in mind all of your points accrued will be lost and if you do choose to create a new account, your balance will go back to zero

settings.question: WILL MY POINTS BE REFUNDED IF I RETURN OR REFUND A PURCHASE?
settings.answer: If you used rewards points on a purchase and you return or refund your order, the points used will be returned to your account.

settings.question: I NEED HELP
settings.answer:
Email us at support@bhfo.com.

You can also give us a call at 855-588-2436.

settings.welcome_text: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

settings.title: BHFO BRAND AMBASSADOR
settings.text:
Are you obsessed with designer fashion? Do you follow all the latest trends? Do you LOVE a good deal?

If any of these apply to you, we want you to be a part of the BHFO Ambassador Program today!

Create 1-2 tagged posts
and 3-5 stories of you in BHFO

Create brand awareness and direct
traffic to our social channels.

We guarantee all items are authentic
or your money back.

We offer a best price guarantee -
domestic competitors only.

We strive for 5-Star Customer Service.
We love to talk to our customers!

We are able to offer our customers
thousands of new products daily.

settings.welcome_text: BCBGMAXAZRIA® from renowned fashion designer Max Azria has redefined the designer category by offering high-quality, on-trend clothing at contemporary price points.

The Vince Camuto® style inspires women and men to radiate confidence, seek the unexpected, and always dare to be bold! Its collections have grown to encompass clothing and accessories that are forever modern and forward thinking.

Steve Madden® has every style to help pull your look together, whatever the occasion. Expect chunky sneakers and denim for your everyday vibe, as well as chic, strappy heeled sandals with a gorgeous dress to elevate any look.
Reebok® means sport since 1895. Within its range of technical products, you can match apparel, accessories, and shoes to create fitness outfits, from running to yoga workouts.
Lucky Brand’s® denim is crafted for all day comfort and cut for a flattering look, so you'll always look as good as you feel.

From hand stitched seams to dreamy lace inserts, there is love in Free People’s® vintage inspired details. Inspiration is gathered from the past and interpreted for the modern girl in a way that makes her feel one of a kind.
Bold, witty, and intelligent, French Connection’s® approach to fashion has made it stand out amongst today’s high street. Its collections are sexy, stylish and with attitude.

Fila® has always taken pride in creating designs as bold and breathtaking as its wearers. With a commitment to performance, continuing to make a statement with styles that are good in aesthetic and effective in function.

Clarks’® long history should tell you a lot about how successful this shoe manufacturer is at making shoes that fit. When you shop leather shoes at Clarks® , expect quality leather and materials for everlasting style.
BCBG stands for “bon chic, bon genre”: it is a French slang meaning “good style, good attitude”. It is the younger and more contemporary line by BCBGMAXAZRIA and geared toward a younger audience.

settings.title: Best brands, best prices: what makes BHFO unique
Packaging
settings.text: Our functional packaging allows us to keep our costs minimal and pass on the savings to you. Most items are shipped in a poly-mailer, rather than wrapped in a box with tissue paper and pretty ribbons.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.text: We charge shipping on our site, which allows us to keep our prices low. No built-in costs to offer “free shipping” passed on to you. Just the best brands in fashion at better prices, every day!

settings.title: Merchandise
settings.text: Our opportunistic purchasing style allows us to bring you the Best Brands at Better Prices. All items are new, but they might need to be ironed or pressed.

settings.title: We will match any competitor's catalog or online price
Thousands of new items added daily
Designer brands without breaking your budget
Your opinion really matters to us
Orders leave our warehouse within one business day

settings.title_small: Fashion has never been more affordable!
settings.title:
We are able to offer thousands
of new products daily
Start a return
settings.text: CLICK HERE to start a return. You may enter your Order ID # and Shipping Zip Code, or enter the email address associated with your order.

settings.title: Select items
settings.text: Next, choose which item(s) you would like to return and select the reason you are returning the item(s).

settings.title: Complete the return
settings.text: If everything looks correct in the return summary, you may complete the return.

settings.title: Print prepaid label
settings.text: Download and print your USPS prepaid label and drop off at your nearest USPS location. Click here to find a USPS location near you.

settings.title: Get refund
settings.text: You will receive a credit to your original payment method within 10 business days of the return being delivered to our warehouse.

settings.title: To request a domestic order refund:
settings.note_text:
Once we receive the return item(s) back to our warehouse and validate the return reason, we will refund the pre-paid return label cost for ‘Item is damaged’ and ‘Received wrong item’ return reasons.

All "Final Sale" items returned without approval will be restocked without a refund.

settings.title: Print form
settings.text: Print a "Returns Authorization Form" from this page for each item you are returning. This form must be filled out completely and included in your return package within 30 days of leaving our warehouse.

settings.title: Pack items
settings.text: In your return package, include the Returns Authorization Form and the item you are returning in its original, unused condition with original tags, packaging and protective liner intact (if applicable). We are unable to accept items with signs of wear, heavy perfume or smoke. Intimate apparel bottoms including panties and swimwear bottoms are non-returnable.

settings.title: Mail pack
settings.text:
Mail your return to the address below. We will process your return within 10 business days of receipt. We will refund the purchase price less shipping costs. Mail your return to:

BHFO, Inc.
Attn: BHFO.com Returns Department
4520 20th Ave SW
Cedar Rapids, IA 52404

settings.title: To request an international order refund:

settings.welcome_text: Calvin Klein® stands for quintessential American minimalism, combining clean lines with classic hues, which translate elegantly to a modern lifestyle for both men and women.
Bloomingdales®’ private label, Aqua® differs itself for its bright, bold, and sparkling design. This brand provides high quality women's apparel, shoes, and accessories.
Find the perfect pair of Ugg® boots, or slippers: from fluffy wool to cozy sheepskin, we have you covered!
Marc Fisher® offers a variety of collections and styles, including wedges, espadrilles, pumps, heels, sandals, and boots.
Since his first fashion show in 1977, Elie Tahari® is the epitome of elegance and style. From business attires to sleek silk blouses, your outfit will always look impeccable.

Since 1873 Levi’s® jeans have become one of the most recognizable brands in the
world, capturing the imagination and loyalty of people for generations.

Inspired by the singer, you’ll find apparel with ultra-feminine touches that exude subtle sophistication. Plus, the former reality show star has provided clothing for all body types including designs in plus sizes for curvy girls.
Rag & Bone® has become synonymous with innately wearable clothing that melds classic tailoring with an edgy yet understated New York aesthetic.
From remote Australia, Emu Ridge® has been synonymous of comfort, quality, and coziness since 1948, making it the leader in sheepskin and Merino wool products.

Tommy Hilfiger® is one of the world’s leading designer lifestyle brands and it is internationally recognized for celebrating the essence of classic American cool style, featuring preppy with twist design.
Authentic and iconic, romantic, and elegant, Ralph Lauren® symbolizes the modern lifestyle for both women and men, representing energetic style made in the USA.

If you are looking for the perfect dress for nearly every occasion, you have come to the right brand! Alfani® offers a wide range of styles, from elegant, to casual, all with the best fabric and quality.
With a modern twist on classic denim, Joe’s Jeans® is the new most favorite jeans brands for men and women.
Naturalizer® has been designing shoes for the past century with one main goal: provide comfort with anatomically designed cushioning, without compromising on style and elegance.
Adidas® brings together sporting heritage and innovative styles to create the newest and coolest streetwear.
J Brand® is a Los Angeles based premium denim brand. They put emphasis on creating timeless denim products that have the perfect fit.
With a sharp focus on providing customers with accessories and clothes that are consistently polished, chic, relaxed and glamorous, Michal Kors® has created an iconic luxury lifestyle brand.
Puma®’s range of innovative sports inspired lifestyle products reaches out to anyone looking for an authentic style rooted in sports.
Cole Haan® is an American luxury brand known for premium men's and women's footwear as well as apparel and accessories.
INC® International Concepts is classic, versatile fashion for men and women. Affordable quality professional and casual wardrobe wear.
